title: (x) Farm Fresh Script Font Help - Fenway Park, Spoleto/OptiSport/Aktuelle {self (Alex Deckard), Mike Y}
content:
Can anyone assist with some font ID help. I am trying to find a script font similar to those in the attached images. Unfortunately What The Font doesn't do very well with letters that are connected.

Thanks for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100918122322im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Firefox_6011.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100918122322im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lost_6561.jpg)
author: ad85

comments.content: nevermind... found it. Fenway Park from Jukebox Type. Available at Veer.

"Farm fresh" is from Fenway Park, but "Let's" is not. That comes from Spoleto/OptiSport/Aktuelle. which we often have posts about here. (The L is not right in Fenway Park.)

- Mike Yanega
